Shipping.title: FETRA Shipping ‚Äî Your Products, Delivered with Care
Shipping.subtitle: At FETRA, we do everything to ensure your wellness ritual reaches you in the best conditions and timeframe.
Shipping.offerText: Shipping is FREE on ALL orders!
Shipping.processingText: All orders are processed and shipped within 24h to 48h business days after validation.
Shipping.trackingEmail: You will receive a shipping confirmation email with your tracking number as soon as your package leaves our warehouse.
Shipping.methodsSubtitle: We offer the following shipping methods for mainland France:
Shipping.standardDelay: Timeframe: 3 to 5 business days after dispatch
Shipping.standardNote: Normal value: ‚Ç¨4.90 ‚Äî Currently free during our launch period
Shipping.internationalText: We also ship to Belgium and Switzerland. Shipping costs and timeframes are automatically calculated at checkout.

Shipping.problemTitle: What to Do If There's a Problem?
Shipping.problemText: If you encounter an issue with your order's delivery (abnormal delay, damaged package, non-receipt), please contact our customer service at contact@fetrabeauty.com with your order number.

meta.title: Returns & Refunds ‚Äî FETRA BEAUTY
meta.description: 14-day withdrawal period. Free and easy returns. Refund within 5-10 business days after receipt.

Returns.title: FETRA Returns & Refunds ‚Äî Your Satisfaction, Our Priority
Returns.subtitle: At FETRA, we want you to be completely satisfied with your Lifting Face Ritual. If, for any reason, you're not fully convinced, you have a period to return your order to us.
Returns.bannerText: We're committed to making the return process as simple as possible for you.
Returns.periodText: In accordance with European legislation, you have 14 calendar days from the date of receipt of your order to exercise your right of withdrawal and return the product(s) to us.
Returns.conditionsSubtitle: To be eligible for a return, your item must be:
Returns.conditionUnused: Unused and in the same condition as when you received it
Returns.conditionPackaging: In its original, complete, and intact packaging (box, pouch, instructions, etc.)
Returns.conditionProof: Accompanied by proof of purchase (invoice or order confirmation)
Returns.conditionsWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important: We reserve the right to refuse a return if these conditions are not met.
Returns.step1Text: Send an email to contact@fetrabeauty.com specifying your order number and the reason for your return.
Returns.step1Extra: Our customer service will send you a prepaid return label.
Returns.step2Text: Carefully pack the product(s) in its/their original packaging.
Returns.step3Text: Drop off your package at the nearest Mondial Relay or La Poste collection point (according to the carrier indicated in your return label).
Returns.refundsText1: Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to inform you of the approval or rejection of your refund.
Returns.refundsText2: If approved, your refund will be processed and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original payment method within 5 to 10 business days.
Returns.refundsNote: Note: Initial shipping costs are non-refundable (except in case of our error or defective product).
Returns.exchangesText: We don't offer direct exchanges. If you wish to exchange an item, please return it for a refund and place a new order.
Returns.questionText: Our team is here to support you at every step.
Returns.ctaSubtitle: Reveal your skin's natural radiance in 5 minutes a day

Contact.title: We're Here for You
Contact.subtitle: Questions about the FETRA ritual? Need help with your order? Our team responds quickly.
Contact.emailDescription: For any general questions, usage advice, or product information.
Contact.supportDescription: For order issues, returns, or technical questions.
Contact.faq1Question: How to use the FETRA ritual?
Contact.faq1Answer: The ritual takes 5 minutes: cleanse your face, apply 3-4 drops of oil, drain with the roller from center outward, then sculpt with the Gua Sha.
Contact.faq2Question: Is the ritual suitable for men?
Contact.faq2Answer: Absolutely! FETRA is designed for all faces, regardless of gender. Wellness has no boundaries.
Contact.faq3Answer: Drainage effects are visible from the first use. Lifting and firming effects appear gradually after 2-3 weeks of regular use.
Contact.faq4Question: Can I use the ritual every day?
Contact.faq4Answer: Yes! The ritual is designed for daily use, in the morning to boost radiance, in the evening to relax.
Contact.ctaSubtitle: Discover the ritual that will transform your beauty routine

meta.title: Our Story ‚Äî FETRA
meta.description: From skepticism to daily ritual. Discover how FETRA was born from a personal discovery to create a universal beauty ritual, without gender distinction.

About.title: From Skepticism to Daily Ritual
About.subtitle: How a personal discovery gave birth to FETRA, a universal and authentic beauty brand.
About.chapter1Para1: As a man, I never really paid attention to "beauty tools". For me, it was a complex and somewhat... intimidating world. Dozens of products, lengthy routines, vocabulary I didn't understand.
About.chapter1Para2: Yet, like many, I felt the effects of stress: long days in front of screens, short nights, drawn features in the morning. I was just looking for a simple way to look fresher and less tired. Nothing complicated.
About.chapter2Para1: I discovered Gua Sha and Rose Quartz somewhat by chance. At first, I was skeptical. "Stones for the face? Really?" But I decided to give it a try.
About.chapter2Para2: Not for "beauty" in the conventional sense, but for well-being. For the massage, the cold sensation on the skin, the 5-minute relaxation in the evening before sleep. A moment just for me.
About.chapter2Quote: It wasn't a beauty routine. It was my moment to disconnect.
About.chapter3Para1: Within a few days, I not only felt a relaxing benefit, but I saw a difference. Less puffiness under the eyes upon waking. More defined features. Skin that looked healthier, more radiant.
About.chapter3Para2: And most importantly, I realized something important: this simple ritual had nothing "feminine" or "masculine" about it. It was just... human. Taking care of yourself is universal. Why make it a secret or exclusive?
About.chapter4Intro: I created FETRA for a simple reason:
About.chapter4Para1: To share a universal, effective and honest ritual, for all faces. For everyone who wants to take 5 minutes for themselves, and feel good. Without artifice, without unrealistic promises, without gender barriers.
About.chapter4Para2: FETRA is not just a beauty kit. It's a moment of pause in your day. It's an invitation to take care of yourself, simply and naturally.
About.value1Text: For all faces, all genders, all skin types
About.value3Text: 5 minutes a day for an effective ritual
About.contactText: Our team is here to guide you in discovering the FETRA ritual.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know before ordering
FAQ.question1: Is the FETRA ritual suitable for men?
FAQ.answer1: Absolutely! It is designed for all faces seeking natural radiance, sculpted features and a moment of well-being, regardless of gender. Over 30% of our customers are men.
FAQ.question2: Is my skin type or complexion compatible with the FETRA Kit?
FAQ.answer2: Yes, the FETRA Kit is formulated to suit all skin types and complexions. Our Rose Quartz tools and natural oil provide gentle care that respects your skin. Whether you have sensitive, oily, dry or combination skin, the ritual adapts perfectly.
FAQ.answer3: Draining effects (reduction of puffiness and dark circles) are visible from the first use. Lifting and firming effects become progressively visible after 2-3 weeks of regular use (5 minutes per day). The complexion glow is immediate!
FAQ.question4: Will the oil make my skin greasy?
FAQ.answer4: Not at all! Our regenerating oil has a light texture that penetrates instantly without leaving a greasy film. It's even suitable for combination and oily skin as it nourishes without clogging pores. You can use it in the morning before makeup.
FAQ.answer5: Yes, absolutely. We only use genuine natural Rose Quartz, no plastic or resin. Each stone is unique with its own shades of pink. This authenticity guarantees the naturally cooling and soothing properties.
FAQ.question6: How long does the oil bottle last?
FAQ.answer6: A 30ml bottle lasts about 2-3 months with daily use (3-4 drops per day are enough). The oil keeps for 12 months after opening.
FAQ.question7: Can I use the ritual if I have acne or sensitive skin?
FAQ.answer7: Yes! Rose Quartz is naturally soothing and anti-inflammatory, ideal for sensitive or acne-prone skin. Our oil is 100% natural with no synthetic fragrance. However, if you have severe or inflamed acne, consult your dermatologist before use.
FAQ.question8: How do I clean my Rose Quartz tools?
FAQ.answer8: Very simple: clean them after each use with lukewarm water and mild soap, then dry with a clean cloth. Once a week, you can disinfect them with a little 70% alcohol. Store them in their provided pouch.
FAQ.answer9: You have 14 days after receipt to return your complete kit, unused and in its original packaging. We refund you in full without asking questions. Our goal: your 100% satisfaction.
FAQ.question10: Can I give this ritual as a gift?
FAQ.answer10: Absolutely! The FETRA Kit arrives in beautiful premium packaging perfect for gifting. You can add a personalized message with your order. It's the perfect gift for someone you love (or for yourself!).

Reviews.title: Customer Reviews
Reviews.review1Comment: Amazing product! My skin is much firmer after only 2 weeks of use. The quartz roller is very pleasant to use.
Reviews.review2Comment: Excellent value for money. The oil is very nourishing and the complete kit allows for a truly relaxing ritual.
Reviews.review3Comment: Very satisfied, although I find the roller could be slightly larger. Results are visible quickly.

meta.title: Support & Help ‚Äî FETRA BEAUTY
meta.description: FETRA help center: FAQ, support contact, user guides. We're here to help you get the most out of your lifting ritual.

Support.title: Help Center
Support.subtitle: Quickly find answers to your questions or contact us directly. We're here to help you!
Support.faq1Question: How do I use the jade roller?
Support.faq1Answer: After applying your serum or oil, gently roll from the center of your face outward, working from bottom to top. Use the small roller for the eye area and the large roller for cheeks, forehead, and neck. Apply light pressure and repeat each movement 5-10 times.
Support.faq2Question: How often should I use the ritual?
Support.faq2Answer: For optimal results, we recommend using the complete ritual (gua sha + roller + oil) 3-4 times per week. You can use it daily if you wish, especially in the morning to reduce puffiness.
Support.faq3Question: Can I use the ritual with my own products?
Support.faq3Answer: Yes! While our oil is specially formulated to work with the tools, you can use your own serum or facial oil. Just make sure your skin is well hydrated to allow the stones to glide smoothly.
Support.guide1Description: Step-by-step video to master the lifting ritual
Support.guide2Description: How to clean and care for your jade and rose quartz tools
Support.guide3Description: Advanced techniques to target specific areas
Support.guide4Description: Solutions to common problems and tips
Support.contactSubtitle: Our customer service team is here for you

meta.title: Tips & Tutorials ‚Äî FETRA
meta.description: Discover how to use your 3-in-1 Rose Quartz Kit. Video tutorials, user guides, and expert advice for a perfect facial ritual.

Blog.heroSubtitle: Everything you need to know to get the most out of your 3-in-1 Rose Quartz Kit
Blog.fundamental1Text: Before and after each use, clean your tools with warm water and mild soap. Dry them gently with a clean cloth.
Blog.fundamental2Text: NEVER use your tools on dry skin! Oil allows the stones to glide smoothly and multiplies the benefits of the massage.
Blog.fundamental3Text: Always massage from the inside out and upward. Follow the natural lines of lymphatic drainage.
Blog.tutorialsSubtitle: Follow our step-by-step guides to master your FETRA ritual
Blog.tutorial1Description: Reduce puffiness and awaken the face with the roller and mushroom tool. Focus on dark circles and bags.
Blog.tutorial1Point2: Drainage of bags and dark circles
Blog.tutorial2Description: Sculpt and lift with the heart Gua Sha. Focus on the jawline, cheekbones, and face oval.
Blog.tool1Description: Your morning ally. Place it in the fridge for an instant decongestant effect.
Blog.tool2Description: Your sculptor. Perfect for lifting the face oval and cheekbones.
Blog.tool3Description: Your dark circle expert. Designed for the delicate eye area.
Blog.faq1Question: How often should I use my kit?
Blog.faq1Answer: Ideally 5 minutes per day for quickly visible results. If you're short on time, use it 10-15 minutes, 3 times per week. Consistency is more important than duration!
Blog.faq2Question: I have acne, can I use the kit?
Blog.faq2Answer: Yes! Lymphatic drainage even helps reduce inflammation. However, avoid areas of active inflammation (red or painful pimples). Massage healthy areas to stimulate circulation and toxin elimination.
Blog.faq3Answer: Use the cold roller after shaving to soothe razor burn! The chilled rose quartz instantly calms irritation and reduces redness. A game-changer for your post-shave routine.
Blog.faq4Answer: No! If you use the right pressure. The pressure should be gentle yet firm, as if spreading a thick cream. Never painful. If you see lasting redness, you're pressing too hard.
Blog.faq5Question: Can I share my tools with my partner?
Blog.faq5Answer: For hygiene reasons, it's best if everyone has their own kit. However, if you carefully clean the tools after each use (mild soap + warm water + 70% alcohol disinfection), it's possible!
Blog.faq6Answer: Immediately for puffiness reduction and radiance (cooling effect). After 1 week for reduction of bags and dark circles. After 2-3 weeks for wrinkle smoothing and feature definition. After 1 month for visible and lasting lift effect.
Blog.ctaSubtitle: Discover the 3-in-1 Rose Quartz Kit and transform your beauty routine
